title: GSTD Platform
subtitle: Distributed Computing Network on TON
hero_subtitle: Enterprise-grade decentralized computing infrastructure on TON blockchain. Process AI inference, validation, and data tasks with cryptographic certainty.
why_gstd_desc: Built for enterprises and developers who need reliable, secure, and scalable distributed computing infrastructure.
feat_speed_desc: 5-second average task completion with intelligent load balancing across global network nodes.
feat_secure_desc: End-to-end AES-256-GCM encryption. Zero-knowledge execution. Your data never leaves your control.
feat_scale_desc: Horizontally scalable architecture. Add capacity on-demand with automatic load redistribution.
creator_1: Create tasks via Web UI, REST API, or SDK
creator_2: Pay only for completed work in TON
worker_1: Register any device as computing node
worker_2: Automatic task assignment based on capability
gstd_desc: GSTD (Guaranteed Service Time Depth) is a utility token for platform operations. Fully compliant with MiCA (EU) and SEC (US) requirements. Backed by XAUt gold through the GSTD/XAUt liquidity pool.
docs_subtitle: Everything you need to integrate with GSTD Platform
no_tasks_desc: No tasks found. Create a new task to get started.
no_my_tasks_desc: You haven't created any tasks yet. Create your first task to get started.
no_available_tasks_desc: No tasks are currently available for execution.
delete_task_confirm: Are you sure you want to delete this task?
no_devices_desc: You haven't registered any devices yet. Connect a worker to start earning.
no_stats_desc: Statistics will appear after you complete some tasks.
feature_in_development: This feature is currently in development.
connect_wallet_to_work: Please connect your wallet to view and manage devices.
no_nodes_desc: Register your first computing node to start earning GSTD by processing tasks.
name: Name
network_temperature_tooltip: Average entropy score across all operations. High temperature = low network reliability.
computational_pressure_tooltip: Pending tasks / Active nodes. High pressure = network overload.
pool_balance_tooltip: GSTD balance in the liquidity pool
platform_desc_long: GSTD is a decentralized computing platform built on TON Blockchain. We connect task creators with a global network of computing nodes to execute AI inference, data processing, and validation tasks with cryptographic guarantees.
feature_latency: Ultra-low latency task execution with smart load balancing
feature_security: End-to-end AES-256-GCM encryption for all data
step_cust_2: Click 'Create Task' and fill in the parameters
api_desc: Integrate GSTD into your applications using our REST API
step_exec_1_desc: Add your device to the network
step_exec_2_desc: Tasks are processed automatically in your browser
step_exec_3_desc: Get paid in TON for completed tasks
how_it_works_desc: GSTD Platform connects Workers with computational tasks in a decentralized network.
step_1_register_desc: Connect your device to the GSTD network. Your device becomes a Worker node that can process tasks.
step_2_execute_desc: Receive and execute computational tasks. Tasks are automatically assigned based on your device capabilities.
step_3_earn_desc: Get paid in TON for successfully completed tasks. Compensation is automatically distributed via smart contracts.
ai_verification_desc: Distribute AI model inference across a decentralized network.
iot_desc: Process data from IoT devices at the edge.
gstd_utility_desc: is a technical parameter that measures the certainty depth of computational results in the network.
what_is_gstd_desc: GSTD represents the guaranteed level of service quality and result validation.
how_gstd_works_desc: When you create a task, you specify a minimum GSTD requirement. The network ensures your task is validated accordingly.

client.createFirstTask: Create your first task to get started
client.confirmCancel: Are you sure you want to cancel this task?
client.confirmRefund: Are you sure you want to request a refund?

boinc_bridge_desc: Bridge scientific computing tasks from BOINC projects to GSTD network.
